title: error message from codereview.py not helpful
body:
I change $GOROOT/doc/code.html, and type 'hg change', and it says
'abort: cannot create CL outside default branch'
which is not helpful at all.  If it had named the branch it didn't like, for instance,
'abort: cannot create CL outside default branch (release-branch.go1)'
I might have had a clue as to what I was doing wrong.

The message is at line 1312 of $GOROOT/lib/codereview/codereview.py

Even better would be an error message that tells the user what to do.
